content: what could be cuter than baby yoda the christmas baby yoda getting into the mood of december i decided to create my own version of baby yoda - for the third time it turned out better than i thought and since we re close to christmas i decided to share the pattern with anyone who wants to make a christmas baby yoda to sell give as a gift or decorate any environment hope you like it blush christmas_tree **note ** the sale of this pattern in whole or in part original or adapted is prohibited i ask that if you want to share it with someone or post the pictures of your christmas baby yoda do not forget to credit my new craft amigurumis so in addition to sharing your own work you also share mine and help me keep doing what i love the most heart yarn **materials used** * círculo yarns amigurumi in colors amêndoa 7650 beige castanha 7625 a little darker than beige pistache 5800 green cereja 3583 red and branco 8001 white * 2 mm crochet hook * one mini white pompom * 8 mm black eyes with safety lock * 3 cm plastic round base * glue for crafts * silicone fiber or other filling of your choice * scissors straight_ruler this christmas baby yoda is approximately 10 5 cm **note ** if you prefer to use another yarn do not forget to adapt the hook eyes and plastic base to a size that is more suitable ***happy crocheting ***
